instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00239: What is 820-00239? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.SMC_LID: What is SMC_LID? SMC_LID tells the machine the system is open when it is 3.3v to 3.4v, and closed when it is low such as 0v-0.6v. When this signal is low, the machine may go to sleep or have no backlight. .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00239</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> NO VIDEO INTERNAL OR EXTERNAL
threads.message:
Hi,
This Board tuens on and charging properly But no video on internal or external.
But keyboard caps lock light in on and when i boot from usb i can see usb is reading..
<SIGNAL>SMC_LID</SIGNAL> is 3.3v.

I tried with different dispay still no display.
Aany help greatly appriciate.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00239</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> NO VIDEO INTERNAL OR EXTERNAL
threads.message:
Any history available, liquid signs close to J8500?

Do you get 3V3/<SIGNAL>5V_S0SW_LCD</SIGNAL> in the first few seconds at least?
If yes, check <SIGNAL>DP_INT_HPD</SIGNAL> at same time (for pulse at least).
